about.main: [LavaMusic](https://github.com/brblacky/lavamusic/) is [Blacky#6618](https://github.com/brblacky), [Venom#9718](https://github.com/Venom9718/), [AkAbhijit#6892](https://github.com/AkAbhijit/)'s Was created by Blacky, Venom and Abhijit. Hope you enjoy using LavaMusic!
